description:
In this video I build a robot that plays FPS games to emphasize the shortcomings of traditional anti-cheat. Then I provide a solution with WALDO, the world's first working visual cheat detection solution. 
This video was made possible by Micro Center.

Shop Micro Center's Top Deals: https://micro.center/fb11a2

Shop Micro Center's Fall Savings Event: https://micro.center/a7e6ed

AMD CPU, Motherboard, and RAM Bundle Deals: https://micro.center/f15f95

Intel CPU, Motherboard, and RAM Bundle Deals: https://micro.center/4a2d26

Please consider checking out the links above to support the channel. I highly suggest Micro Center for all computer hardware related purchases. 



Chapters/timestamps:

00:00 I Built a Robot that plays FPS Games

00:45 Why?

1:20 Literal Aimbot Build

02:20 Origin story 

03:20 BRAINS / How it works

03:50 How Hardware Aim Cheats Work

04:30 Why current anti-cheat can't detect these

05:10 Testing these cheats as brain 1 & 2

05:55 Inverse Kinematics is super easy
title: I Built a Robot that Plays FPS Games
